entry.title: New release for WordPress ActivityPub: 4.3.0
entry.content:
What's Changed

  • Copy image, because otherwise it will be deleted. by @pfefferle in https://github.com/Automattic/wordpress-activitypub/pull/1005
  • Outsource Constants to a separate file by @pfefferle in https://github.com/Automattic/wordpress-activitypub/pull/1006
  • Generate unique ID by @pfefferle in https://github.com/Automattic/wordpress-activitypub/pull/1004
  • Make change log entries mandatory with every PR by @obenland in https://github.com/Automattic/wordpress-activitypub/pull/988
  • Too many READMEs by @pfefferle in https://github.com/Automattic/wordpress-activitypub/pull/1009
  • Show '‚ÅÇ Fediverse Preview' link in Row-Actions by @pfefferle in https://github.com/Automattic/wordpress-activitypub/pull/989
  • Change preview showing the name instead of the preferredUsername by @Menrath in https://github.com/Automattic/wordpress-activitypub/pull/1011
  • Add an early return filter for get_upload_dir() by @mattwiebe in https://github.com/Automattic/wordpress-activitypub/pull/1008
  • Welcome to the project/team @obenland by @pfefferle in https://github.com/Automattic/wordpress-activitypub/pull/1010
  • EMA: Fix fatal when account is invalid by @akirk in https://github.com/Automattic/wordpress-activitypub/pull/1014
  • Editor: avoid errors when switching to edit a Pattern block by @mattwiebe in https://github.com/Automattic/wordpress-activitypub/pull/1023
  • Prevention against self pings by @pfefferle in https://github.com/Automattic/wordpress-activitypub/pull/1022
  • Fixed: Missing attachement-type for enclosures by @pfefferle in https://github.com/Automattic/wordpress-activitypub/pull/1021
  • Actors: deprecate as User_Collection throughout by @mattwiebe in https://github.com/Automattic/wordpress-activitypub/pull/1013
  • Test with php 8.4 by @pfefferle in https://github.com/Automattic/wordpress-activitypub/pull/1024
  • Show Follower Name instead of Avatar on mobile view by @pfefferle in https://github.com/Automattic/wordpress-activitypub/pull/1016
  • Do not escape the Username. by @pfefferle in https://github.com/Automattic/wordpress-activitypub/pull/1018
  • Repo Gardening: automatically label more PRs, & auto-label issues by @jeherve in https://github.com/Automattic/wordpress-activitypub/pull/1026
  • Add basic validation to enclosure function by @pfefferle in https://github.com/Automattic/wordpress-activitypub/pull/1028

Full Changelog: https://github.com/Automattic/wordpress-activitypub/compare/4.2.1...4.3.0

entry.title: New release for WordPress ActivityPub: 4.4.0
entry.content:
What's Changed

  • Update plugin URI to a8c org link by @jeffpaul in https://github.com/Automattic/wordpress-activitypub/pull/1032
  • Hashtag: Ignore tags within HTML attributes (like hex colors) by @obenland in https://github.com/Automattic/wordpress-activitypub/pull/1037
  • Dialog: Add screenreader labels by @obenland in https://github.com/Automattic/wordpress-activitypub/pull/1034
  • Fix typo in custom post content settings. by @obenland in https://github.com/Automattic/wordpress-activitypub/pull/1038
  • Settings: Clarify settings text by @obenland in https://github.com/Automattic/wordpress-activitypub/pull/1042
  • Add media type support by @pfefferle in https://github.com/Automattic/wordpress-activitypub/pull/1045
  • Prevent draft posts from being federated when deleted by @obenland in https://github.com/Automattic/wordpress-activitypub/pull/1041
  • Added setting to enable/disable Authorized-Fetch by @pfefferle in https://github.com/Automattic/wordpress-activitypub/pull/1017
  • Make list of moderators filterable by @pfefferle in https://github.com/Automattic/wordpress-activitypub/pull/1047
  • Version bump 4.4.0 by @obenland in https://github.com/Automattic/wordpress-activitypub/pull/1054

New Contributors

  • @jeffpaul made their first contribution in https://github.com/Automattic/wordpress-activitypub/pull/1032

Full Changelog: https://github.com/Automattic/wordpress-activitypub/compare/4.3.0...4.4.0

entry.title: New release for WordPress ActivityPub: 4.5.0
entry.content:
What's Changed

  • Admin: Move plugin settings link into Admin class by @obenland in https://github.com/Automattic/wordpress-activitypub/pull/1050
  • Use WP Autoloader class by @obenland in https://github.com/Automattic/wordpress-activitypub/pull/1051
  • Update tests to use plugin folder structure by @obenland in https://github.com/Automattic/wordpress-activitypub/pull/1049
  • Integrations: Use Autoloader by @obenland in https://github.com/Automattic/wordpress-activitypub/pull/1052
  • Tests: Move autoloader into correct folder. by @obenland in https://github.com/Automattic/wordpress-activitypub/pull/1055
  • Improve Interactions moderation by @pfefferle in https://github.com/Automattic/wordpress-activitypub/pull/1065
  • Change E-Mail templates to match new comment-types by @pfefferle in https://github.com/Automattic/wordpress-activitypub/pull/1066
  • This adds Icon support for Audio and Video attachments by @pfefferle in https://github.com/Automattic/wordpress-activitypub/pull/1053
  • Init new custom mailer class by @pfefferle in https://github.com/Automattic/wordpress-activitypub/pull/1068
  • Remove asset updater by @pfefferle in https://github.com/Automattic/wordpress-activitypub/pull/1071
  • Comments: Account for custom comment types when calculating comment counts by @obenland in https://github.com/Automattic/wordpress-activitypub/pull/1073
  • Blocks: Avoid PHP warning in Reply block by @obenland in https://github.com/Automattic/wordpress-activitypub/pull/1076
  • Improved comment-type handling by @pfefferle in https://github.com/Automattic/wordpress-activitypub/pull/1072
  • Change priority of attachments by @pfefferle in https://github.com/Automattic/wordpress-activitypub/pull/1082
  • Tests: Make it easier to run unit tests locally by @obenland in https://github.com/Automattic/wordpress-activitypub/pull/1083
  • Use a more explicit signature verification by @pfefferle in https://github.com/Automattic/wordpress-activitypub/pull/1078
  • Add comment count upgrade routine by @obenland in https://github.com/Automattic/wordpress-activitypub/pull/1080
  • Add a reaction block by @mattwiebe in https://github.com/Automattic/wordpress-activitypub/pull/1070
  • Version bump 4.5.0 by @obenland in https://github.com/Automattic/wordpress-activitypub/pull/1088
  • Workflow: Install SVN before trying to deploy by @obenland in https://github.com/Automattic/wordpress-activitypub/pull/1089

Full Changelog: https://github.com/Automattic/wordpress-activitypub/compare/4.4.0...4.5.0

entry.title: New release for WordPress ActivityPub: 4.6.0
entry.content:
What's Changed

  • PHPUnit: Fix slow tests by @obenland in https://github.com/Automattic/wordpress-activitypub/pull/1087
  • Docs: Add missing hook documentation by @obenland in https://github.com/Automattic/wordpress-activitypub/pull/1099
  • Add test for HTML in direct messages by @akirk in https://github.com/Automattic/wordpress-activitypub/pull/1093
  • Include @mentions in the JSON representation of the reply by @pfefferle in https://github.com/Automattic/wordpress-activitypub/pull/1086
  • Editor: Make Fediverse preview template filterable by @obenland in https://github.com/Automattic/wordpress-activitypub/pull/1098
  • Ensure that direct messages are only sent when the user is the recipient by @akirk in https://github.com/Automattic/wordpress-activitypub/pull/1102
  • Reactions: Don't display avatar when it's empty by @obenland in https://github.com/Automattic/wordpress-activitypub/pull/1103
  • Some CSS fixes for the reactions block by @pfefferle in https://github.com/Automattic/wordpress-activitypub/pull/1108
  • Settings to enable/disable notifications by @pfefferle in https://github.com/Automattic/wordpress-activitypub/pull/1109
  • Prepare Version 4.6.0 by @pfefferle in https://github.com/Automattic/wordpress-activitypub/pull/1110

Full Changelog: https://github.com/Automattic/wordpress-activitypub/compare/4.5.1...4.6.0
